disclosures.entity: Asian Forum of Parliamentarians on Population and Development (AFPPD)
disclosures.details: Airfares and Accommodation - Cambodia - I was invited to Cambodia by the Asian Forum of Parliamentarians on Population and Development (AFPPD) to attend a conference the on Prevention of Violence against Women and Girls and the Meeting of AFPPD Male Standing Committee on Prevention of Violence against Women

I declare that I visited Azerbaijan between October 27th and November 3rd, 2015. The Government of Azerbaijan paid for return airfares for myself and wife, Maureen Walsh, plus accommodation and meals.

I wish to advise that the Government of Azerbaijan paid for return first class airfares to Baku and return to Melbourne for me and my wife, Maureen Walsh. Additionally, they covered all internal airfares and accommodation.
